= Client API Sample Code =

#include <stdlib.h>

#include <stdio.h>

#include <string.h>

#include "interface.h"

int main()
{
	conn * connection;

	if(cli_connection("127.0.0.1", 1959, &connection))
	{
		char resp[256], cmd[256];
		int i;

		/* Commit a CREAT TABLE command for a table scheme. */
		memset(resp, 0, 256);
		sprintf(cmd, "create table gu(id1 varchar, id2 varchar)");
		cli_commit(connection, cmd, resp);
		printf("ret: %s\n", resp);


		/* Commit a INSERT data command for user data. */
		printf("###begin to insert!\n");
		for(i = 0; i < 10000; i ++)
		{
			memset(resp, 0, 256);
			memset(cmd, 0, 256);
			sprintf(cmd, "insert into gu(gggg%d, bbbb%d)", i, i);
			cli_commit(connection, cmd, resp);
			printf("cmd: %s, ret: %s\n", cmd, resp);

		}
		
		/* Commit a SELECT command for the selected data. */                               
		printf("***begin to select\n");
		for(i = 0; i < 100; i ++)
		{
			memset(resp, 0, 256);
			memset(cmd, 0, 256);
			sprintf(cmd, "select gu(gggg%d)", i*100);
			cli_commit(connection, cmd, resp);
			printf("cmd: %s, ret: %s\n", cmd, resp);
			memset(cmd, 0, 256);
			sprintf(cmd, "gggg%dbbbb%d", i*100, i*100);
			printf("%s, %s\n", cmd, resp);
		}

		cli_exit(connection);
	}
	return 0;
}
